mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meal_intakes ( user_id, meal_plan_day_id, meal_time, is_consumed, consumed_at, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{mealPlanDayId}, #{mealTime}, #{isConsumed}, #{consumedAt}, NOW(), NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE is_consumed = VALUES(is_consumed), consumed_at = VALUES(consumed_at), updated_at = NOW()
